experience_desc:
• Redesigned sites to enhance navigation and improve visual appeal.
• Established hosting for each website and completed go-live process by uploading sites to host account.
• Conducted backups of Web files to local directories to prevent data loss.

• Served as a mobile app developer to build high quality and mobile responsive apps using flutter/java.
• Published apps in Paystore that received over 250K downloads.

• Developed backend APIs using PHP(Laravel).
• Collaborated with backend and client engineers to help build features and solve creative problems.
• Integrated backend data services to expand available resources within software.

• Conducted data analysis to prepare forecasts and identify trends.
• Worked with internal teams to understand business needs and changing strategies.
• Analyzed and tracked data to prepare forecasts and identify trends.
• Recommended metrics and models based on observed trends.
• Generated reports and obtained data to develop analytics on key performance and operational metrics.
